page.title: 06HAIL WESTON SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: The second public house, the Royal Oak, is in the middle of the village on the Main Street.Both pubs seem to be popular with the locals and also visitors from traffic on the A45 that now bypasses the village. Most of the people commute to either St.Neots, Bedford, Cambridge or London .Only small items of shopping are sold in the village shop and post-office. The bus service is not very good but most people have cars or friends give them lifts to St.Neots for shopping. There is now only a playschool in the village.This is run by parents and held in the hall that was once the village school. The older children now have to be bussed to school.This makes it a long day when you are only five years old.
